item.title: Graduation!
item.description: In less than 5 days I will be officially finsihed with college! It feels like just yesterday I was sitting for the first time in my introductory general chemistry course in a lecture hall with more students in it than my entire high school graduating class. Three and a half years later I can say that Iâ€™ve learned quite a bit academically and about myself. Next semester I plan to work and travel before starting dental school in August!

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: import numpy as np import json a=np.array([range(10)]) a**2 ## array([[ 0, 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, 36, 49, 64, 81]])
